document.full_text: denver broncos linebacker jason hunter was the victim of a stabbing though his injuries were not serious, according to a report on the team's website (http://wwww.denverbroncos.com) on wednesday.
document.title: broncos' hunter stabbed, but injuries not serious: report
lines_and_colors: denver broncos linebacker jason hunter was the victim of a stabbing though his injuries were not serious, according to a report on the team's website (http://wwww.denverbroncos.com) on wednesday.
